languages.text: "Вы ведь не думаете, что на меня впервые направляют оружие, Ваша Светлость? Вы, конечно, можете это сделать. Но я не думаю, что назначенный вами человек проживет дольше часа. Давайте пощадим его и не будем проверять вашу теорию. Тем более, что я буду полезен вам, когда почтенный Каллигос Винтерскейл вернется и обнаружит потери в своем протекторате".

traits.locale_text: "Вы ведь не думаете, что на меня впервые направляют оружие, Ваше Благородие? Вы, конечно, можете это сделать. Но я не думаю, что назначенный вами человек проживет дольше часа. Давайте пощадим его и не будем проверять вашу теорию. Тем более, что я буду полезен вам, когда почтенный Каллигос Винтерскейл вернется и обнаружит потери в своей торговой империи".

languages.text: "Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his protectorate has sustained."
languages.original_text: "Вы ведь не думаете, что на меня впервые направляют оружие, Ваша Светлость? Вы, конечно, можете это сделать. Но я не думаю, что назначенный вами человек проживет дольше часа. Давайте пощадим его и не будем проверять вашу теорию. Тем более, что я буду полезен вам, когда почтенный Каллигос Винтерскейл вернется и обнаружит потери в своем протекторате".

traits.locale_text: "Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his trade empire has sustained."

"Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his trade empire has sustained."

"Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his trade empire has sustained."

"Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his trade empire has sustained."

"Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his protectorate has sustained."

languages.text: 「まさか、銃を突きつけられたのはこれが初めてとはお思いではないね、陛下？撃てばいい。しかし、君が任命した人材が1時間以上続くとは思えないな。その者達の命を無駄にはせず、君の理屈を検証するのはやめておいた方がいい。特に、敬愛するカリゴス・ウィンタースケールが戻ってきて、彼の保護領が被った損失に気づかれたとき、私は君の役に立つだろうから」
languages.original_text: "Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his protectorate has sustained."

traits.locale_text: 「まさか、銃を突きつけられたのはこれが初めてとはお思いではないね、陛下？撃てばいい。しかし、君が任命した人材が1時間以上続くとは思えないな。その者達の命を無駄にはせず、君の理屈を検証するのはやめておいた方がいい。特に、敬愛するカリゴス・ウィンタースケールが戻ってきて、彼の保護領が被った損失に気づかれたとき、私は君の役に立つだろうから」

languages.text: “您该不会以为，这是我第一次被枪指着吧，大人？您当然可以这么做，但我认为，您派来的新总督恐怕用不了一个小时就会丧命。饶了那个人一命吧，不要验证您的猜想了。更何况，若是尊敬的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔回来，看到他的王朝遭受损失时，到时候我会为您派上用场的。”
languages.original_text: "Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his protectorate has sustained."

traits.locale_text: “您该不会以为，这是我第一次被枪指着吧，大人？您当然可以这么做，但我认为，您派来的新总督恐怕用不了一个小时就会丧命。饶了那个人一命吧，不要验证您的猜想了。更何况，若是尊敬的卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔回来，看到他的王朝遭受损失时，到时候我会为您派上用场的。”

languages.text: «¿Se cree que esta es la primera vez que me apuntan con un arma, {mf|milord|milady}? Puede hacerlo, no me malinterprete, pero no creo que el siguiente que asuma el cargo dure más de una hora. Perdonémosle la vida a ese infeliz y abstengámonos de poner a prueba su teoría. Sobre todo porque le seré de utilidad cuando regrese el admirable Calligos Winterscale y vea las pérdidas que ha sufrido su protectorado».
languages.original_text: "Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his protectorate has sustained."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se cree que esta es la primera vez que me apuntan con un arma, {mf|milord|milady}? Puede hacerlo, no me malinterprete, pero no creo que el siguiente que asuma el cargo dure más de una hora. Perdonémosle la vida a ese infeliz y abstengámonos de poner a prueba su teoría. Sobre todo porque le seré de utilidad cuando regrese el admirable Calligos Winterscale y vea las pérdidas que ha sufrido su protectorado».

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez tout de même pas que c'est la première fois que l'on me tient en joue, Votre Seigneurie ? Vous le pourriez, bien entendu, mais je ne pense pas que votre nouveau suzerain tiendrait plus d'une heure. Alors épargnons cette vie hypothétique et abstenons-nous de mettre votre théorie à l'épreuve. D'autant plus que je vous serai fort utile lorsqu'à son retour, l'honorable Calligos Winterscale constatera les pertes subies par son protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his protectorate has sustained."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'imaginez tout de même pas que c'est la première fois que l'on me tient en joue, Votre Seigneurie ? Vous le pourriez, bien entendu, mais je ne pense pas que votre nouveau suzerain tiendrait plus d'une heure. Alors épargnons cette vie hypothétique et abstenons-nous de mettre votre théorie à l'épreuve. D'autant plus que je vous serai fort utile lorsqu'à son retour, l'honorable Calligos Winterscale constatera les pertes subies par son protectorat. »

languages.text: "Ihr glaubt sicher nicht, dass zum ersten Mal auf mich gezielt wird, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Natürlich könntet Ihr das tun. Aber ich glaube kaum, dass mein Nachfolger länger als eine Stunde überleben würde. Lasst uns sein Leben verschonen und Eure Theorie nicht überprüfen. Zumal ich Euch nützlich sein kann, wenn der geschätzte Calligos Winterzunder zurückkehrt und von den Verlusten seines Protektorats erfährt."
languages.original_text: "Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his protectorate has sustained."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt sicher nicht, dass zum ersten Mal auf mich gezielt wird, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Natürlich könntet Ihr das tun. Aber ich glaube kaum, dass mein Nachfolger länger als eine Stunde überleben würde. Lasst uns sein Leben verschonen und Eure Theorie nicht überprüfen. Zumal ich Euch nützlich sein kann, wenn der geschätzte Calligos Winterzunder zurückkehrt und von den Verlusten seines Protektorats erfährt."

languages.text: "Bana ilk kez silah doğrultulduğunu düşünmüyorsunuzdur değil mi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Elbette getirebilirsiniz ama atayacağınız kişi bir saate kalmaz havlu atacaktır. İyisi mi teorinizi hiç sınamayalım. O da sağ kalsın, ben de. Saygıdeğer Calligos Winterscale dönüp de protektorasının maruz kaldığı kayıpları gördüğünde size nasıl yararım dokunacağına odaklanın siz."
languages.original_text: "Surely you don't think that this is my first time at gunpoint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You can do it, of course. But I don't think that the one you appoint will last longer than an hour. Let's spare their life and refrain from testing your theory. Especially since I'll be of use to you when the esteemed Calligos Winterscale returns and sees the losses his protectorate has sustained."

traits.locale_text: "Silah zoruyla ilk kez raks ettiğimi düşünmüyorsunuzdur değil mi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Elbette getirebilirsiniz ama atayacağınız kişi bir saate kalmaz havlu atacaktır. Hiç uğraşmayın, teoriniz test edilmeden kalsın. Özellikle de saygıdeğer Calligos Winterscale dönüp protektorasının maruz kaldığı kayıpları gördüğünde size nasıl yardımcı olacağımı düşünün."
